head_content: The softwares I depend on and the gadgets I adore.

simplelayout_intro: My preferred tools for staying productive.
toolssection1_tool1_content: What’s better than a robust gaming PC for software development!

toolssection3_tool1_content: If I had to live with just one text editor, it would be Visual Studio Code, it’s free and brimming with extensions.
